scripts.start: concurrently -n " auth , client , tickets " -c "bgBlue,bgGreen,bgBlack.bold" "npm run auth" "npm run client" "npm run tickets" -p "{index}-{name}-{time}-{pid}"
scripts.install: concurrently   "cd ./client && npm install" "cd ./common && npm install" "cd ./auth && npm install"  "cd ./payments && npm install"  "cd ./expiration && npm install"  "cd ./orders && npm install"  "cd ./tickets && npm install"
